venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Continuing the Funded Founders Breakfast series: lining up Funded Founders and Funders

RSVP NOW:

When: Tuesday, January 15, 2012 8-10 am - light breakfast
Where: Microsoft NERD, One Memorial Drive, Cambridge, MA
Who: Funded Founders AND a funder. 

  • Our funder is Charlie Cameron, Senior Vice President, Business Development, Cooley LLP, and is also the Founder & Managing Director of Hub Angels Investment Group.
  • Jordan Fliegel is the Founder and CEO of CoachUp.  While CoachUp recently closed a +$2 million Series A, they started off with angel funding from investors like Dharmesh Shah, Ty Danco and Walt Winshall, and earlier this year, it was announced, Bruins president Cam Neely.

What: A panel of Funded founders and a funder discuss how to fund your startup.  This month we're focusing on angel investment.

-- How to connect with potential funders
-- How to structure a funding
-- How the company story evolves over time
-- How long it takes to nail down funding
-- What they would do differently if they had to do it again
-- What recommendations do they have for others
-- What do you want to know? Bring your questions!

We'll open the doors at 8:00 am for networking and breakfast, and kick off the panel promptly at 9:00 am. We're providing coffee and a light breakfast to get your day started right!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Horace Mann room (floor 1) at the NERD Center. Check in with building security for directions.
item.name: Funded Founders Panel and networking
